title: Version 2.0.74 Windows Bug Fix Release
description: Anthropic released Claude Code 2.0.74 to fix critical Windows rendering issues where response text was truncated and misaligned. The release also fixed MCP plugin servers failing due to colons in log directory paths on Windows.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code was rendering improperly on Windows - fixed in 2.0.74
Serious bug in latest version - Windows display issues with text truncation

title: Version 2.0.73 Release
description: Anthropic released Claude Code 2.0.73 with 9 CLI improvements including clickable image links that open attached images in default viewer, enhanced search filtering, custom session ID support, and improved VS Code integration with tab icon badges.

community_feedback.quote: Added clickable [Image #N] links that open attached images in the default viewer

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Integration and CLI 0.75.0
description: OpenAI launched GPT-5.2-Codex as the default model in Codex CLI and IDE extensions, alongside version 0.75.0 with improved TUI scrolling and enhanced sandbox modes.

community_feedback.quote: Codex CLI updates 0.74.0 → 0.75.0 + GPT-5.2-codex new features

title: GPT-5.2 General Availability
description: OpenAI's GPT-5.2, described as the most advanced agentic coding model for professional software engineering with long context windows and front-end UI generation focus, is now generally available in GitHub Copilot across all tiers including Enterprise, Business, Pro, and Pro+.

community_feedback.quote: GPT-5.2 actually feels different, what are you seeing? 5.2 feels less like 'GPT-5 but slightly better' and more like a different vibe altogether
GPT-5.2 is now in 1x public preview

title: Version 2.2 with Visual Browser Editor
description: Cursor 2.2 introduces a revolutionary visual web editor that allows drag-and-drop design manipulation directly in the browser with real-time code updates, plus debug mode, enhanced agent planning, multi-agent judging capabilities, and enterprise features including billing groups and service accounts.

community_feedback.quote: Can you NOT change the UI every week… it is infuriating as hell when I have to reconfigure the editor every week or so after an update
they need to start hiring product managers. There's … a complete lack of product oversight and a culture that incentivizes fast and very buggy code
Warning on cursor upgrade to 2.2 - AI chat freezes and performance problems
Do we even need AI agents when we just make small design changes?

title: Data Analyst Devin (Dana) Launch
description: Cognition Labs released Data Analyst Devin (Dana), a specialized version optimized for data analysis tasks, now available for all users along with Custom Machine State features and enhanced enterprise capabilities.
